about_the_game:
WHIMSIDE is a cozy and relaxing collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen, allowing you to explore it at your own pace, whether you're working, studying, or just watching videos. Embark on a journey through enchanting worlds, each filled with unique creatures and hidden secrets. Capture and create new species of Whimlings, then unleash your creativity by decorating your very whimsical space.

WHIMSIDE opens the door to a magical and soothing universe, always accessible at the bottom of your screen. Move forward at your own rhythm, let time stretch, and enjoy a game that’s always ready to offer a serene break during your day.

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF WHIMSIDE

Set off to explore the many biomes that make up the world of WHIMSIDE. To progress, you'll need to capture or hybridize three specific Whimlings, opening the path to new horizons.

Each biome, rich in its own atmosphere, reveals creatures of varying rarities and allows you to collect new species. Secrets are hidden throughout the landscapes, waiting to be discovered by the most observant explorers.

DESIGN YOUR OWN WHIMSICAL SPACE

In WHIMSIDE, the adventure doesn’t stop at capturing and collecting creatures. As you progress, you’ll unlock a variety of decorations in different ways: by purchasing them, earning them as rewards for your achievements, or by exploring new biomes. You can create and personalize your own whimsical haven, whether it’s a peaceful garden or an extravagant outdoor playground. Your favorite Whimlings can also settle in, keeping you company throughout the day.

CREATE YOUR PERFECT WHIMLING

Fuse two Whimlings and let your imagination run wild, whether you aim to meet specific goals or simply want to craft the Whimling of your dreams. Every unique combination reveals a procedurally generated new species.

These new hybrids will help you progress through the biomes and complete quests. By completing quests, you’ll collect crystals, which can be spent to decorate your whimsical space.

UNLEASH THE TWITCH MAGIC

A special Twitch integration has been designed specifically for streamers, allowing you to share your adventure with your community. Interactions happen seamlessly, with no need for commands, providing a smooth and non-intrusive experience. The more your viewers engage, the more in-game rewards you’ll earn.

WHIMSIDE is perfect to stream alongside Just Chatting, Art, or any other content.

  • Let your viewers help you spot the rarest Whimlings while you focus on something else.

  • Unlock bonuses thanks to viewer participation.

  • Automatically assign names to Whimlings based on your most active viewers.

  • Celebrate hype trains with special in-game events.

WISHLIST AND JOIN THE ADVENTURE

Hi, I’m Toadzillart, the solo developer and pixel artist behind WHIMSIDE. Creating this enchanting universe has been a true labor of love, and I couldn’t have done it without the help of my partner, who has been by my side helping shape this magical world. If WHIMSIDE inspires you, please consider adding it to your wishlist. It’s the best way to support us on this creative journey. Thank you for being part of this adventure and helping to bring this whimsical world to life!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: A creature collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen & fits easily into your routine. Whether you're working, studying, or relaxing, Whimside is always ready to offer you cozy pauses. Capture rare creatures, create new species & decorate your whimsical space in this soothing adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
